extension.summary: This Add-On connect Kodi with the FusionLauncher CLI
extension.description: With this Add-On, you are able to launch Games from various Plattforms directly from Kodi. To do so, a working installation of FusionLauncher with CLI is required. See http://thenewwaytoplay.com/ for more Infos.
